comment: As a future foreign language teacher, Prof. Crooks provided me with an excellent overview of materials and methods.  She is caring, compassionate and interested in the success of her students.

She's a good teacher. She relates her experiences to the topic we are learning. She's funny and is always there to help. bonus points on every test. Need text book for homework and class. Test is made by the company who wrote the book.

Great intro to German class. She takes time to help out her students, and is very lenient in grading. Gives second chances on many assignments and genuinely wants you to do well. You feel very comfortable in her class, as I got away with saying ridiculous things all the time (my accidental mixture of Spanish and German). Would happily take again.

Frau Crooks is a GREAT teacher! Her family is German so she knows a LOT about the language and culture. Very funny and one of the most helpful instructors I've ever had; she never hesitates to help you out when you are stuck. I have to take 5 language classes for my major and am sticking with her as long as possible. Must take!
She is such a wonderful professor! Complete understanding of the German language, helpful when you get stuck, and hilarious! I would highly recommend her for elementary levels of German.

GREAT professor. Really. It was my favorite class and she made it so easy. She brings food as treats for us & the final was the best. I'm taking her again for 1102 & can't be more excited to have her again. She tells great stories & keeps class interesting. I suggest going to stay on top of things. She grades lightly & is understandable w/ things.

Really good teacher, German is a hard language to learn so she makes it as easy as possible. Brings food in. Go to her class! People skipped a lot so we had only about 6 kids in class. She is very nice and always willing to help. Study guides are very precise and help a lot.

This professor was a lot of fun! She told great stories and tried to make the language accessible. I've never taken German, and I was able to make an A in her class. The tests are from the department and can be tricky, but she gives you a good study guide for each one.  Take her if you can!

The previous comments are completely untrue. You get what you put into this class. She works with you to help you get the best grade possible. She also tells great stories about Germany and even brings in German food when she covers that material in the book. I highly recommend this professor.
Comments are on point! There was clearly favoritism-class instruction and grading appeared to be inconsistent. Would not take her again.
I agree with the other comments, grading is not consistent, lack of focus with teaching
